title: ping used to be 30ms but went up to 44ms...
body: Since i got new internet which is supposed to be faster i get 44ms now instead, what is going on? any solution to this?

replies.body: There could be a few issues causing this like an issue with your network or even how your new ISP is routing to the game server.  As a first step, I suggest going through each step in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to strengthen your connection.  Hopefully, this will improve your network but let me know!
